member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_LEVEL_SETTING
member.summary: Represents a video encoder level setting.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_LEVEL_SETTING.DataSize
member.summary: The data size of the provided encoder level setting.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_LEVEL_SETTING.pH264LevelSetting
member.summary: A pointer to a value from the enumeration specifying an H.264 level.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_LEVEL_SETTING.pHEVCLevelSetting
member.summary: A pointer to a structure specifying an HEVC profile.
